alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Hancock; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Perry, west central Meade, east central Hancock and northwestern Breckinridge Counties through 715 PM EDT/615 PM CDT/... At 643 PM EDT/543 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Hawesville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Perry, east central Hancock, west central Meade and northwestern Breckinridge Counties, including the following locations... Mystic, Raymond, Frymire, Skillman, Gerald, Dodd, Andyville, Tobinsport, Holt and Sunny Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
